Code on this directory are taked from other addons with owner permission.

# Original code of mvztool is from https://blenderartists.org/u/maxiv94
# https://blenderartists.org/t/interactive-tools-for-blender-2-8/1164932
# Only smart ring/loop tools registered from this addon

# spiderwebs Originaly Coded by Maxime Herpin, last update was Nov 19, 2017 for Blender 2.79
# I just made some changes that make it work on Blender 2.80 ~ 3.0
# https://github.com/MaximeHerpin/Blender_Spiderwebs
# https://blendermarket.com/products/spider-web-generator
